Script: Izakaya Bottakuri
Translation: Episode 1

Script: （シンゾウ）おっ こんにちは あれ？
Translation: Hello. Huh?

Script: （ナレーション）商店街から― 一本入った路地にある その居酒屋には…
Translation: In the alley next to the shopping street is a Japanese izakaya-style pub…

Script: （ヒロシ） どうも ありがとうございました
Translation: Thank you.

Script: （ナレーション） 物騒な名前が入った のれんが掛けられている
Translation: …that has an unsettling name on its shop curtain.

Script: しかし 勇気を持ってくぐった者は 気づくだろう
Translation: However, those who have the courage to enter will come to realize

Script: うまい酒とおいしい料理
Translation: that this place has good drinks and good food.

Script: そして優しい人たちが ここにいることを… そして優しい人たちが ここにいることを… （馨(かおる)）あっ いらっしゃい そして優しい人たちが ここにいることを…
Translation: -And the company of warm-hearted people. -Welcome.

Script: （美音(みね)）いらっしゃい
Translation: Welcome.

Script: （馨）あっ じゃあ カウンターどうぞ
Translation: Have a seat at the counter.

Script: （ウメ）どうぞ
Translation: -Please come in. -Just a moment.

Script: （馨）はい コート お預かりしますね
Translation: I'll take your coat.

Script: （美音）この店の店主だった父は よく言っていた
Translation: My father who used to own this pub would often say…

Script: （健吾）どこの家庭でも 出てくるような料理で―
Translation: We serve food that can be found in any household,

Script: 金取ってる うちの店は もう それだけでぼったくりだ
Translation: We serve food that can be found in any household, and that in itself makes us a rip-off, a bottakuri.

Script: でもな 美音 たとえ ありきたりの料理でもな
Translation: But Mine, even though they may be common recipes,

Script: 一つ一つ丁寧に心込めて作んだ
Translation: cook every single dish with all your heart.

Script: 料理食べた人が 思わず笑みを浮かべるような一皿
Translation: A dish that unexpectedly brings smiles to people's faces…

Script: それができて初めて―
Translation: Once you can make that,

Script: 払った金 惜しくねえって 客が思ってくれるようになんだ
Translation: our customers will not regret the money they spend.

Script: でも まだ父さんは そこまでじゃない
Translation: But I haven't reached that point yet.

Script: だから この店の名前は “ぼったくり”でいいんだよ
Translation: That's why Bottakuri is the right name for this place.

Script: （トク）美音坊 一番高い酒くれ！
Translation: Mine-bo, pour me your best sake!

Script: トクさん いらっしゃい
Translation: Welcome, Toku.

Script: （馨）いらっしゃい カウンターどうぞ
Translation: Welcome. Have a seat at the counter.

Script: おいおい おいおい 殴り込みじゃねえんだからさ 現場で何かあったのかい？
Translation: Hey now, don't come in throwing fists. Did something happen at work?

Script: （トク）あ？ （シンゾウ）“あ？”じゃないよ
Translation: Huh? Don't give me that. You really look like you could blow off some stream.

Script: 何だよ 憂さ晴らししたくて しょうがねえって顔してるよ
Translation: Don't give me that. You really look like you could blow off some stream.

Script: （美音）じゃあ “ぼったくり”の 名にふさわしく― 一番高いお酒で ぱーっと…
Translation: Well then, true to our Bottakuri namesake, I shall get you the most expensive drink…

Script: と言いたいところですが
Translation: Is what I would like to say but…

Script: 何だ 美音坊 “言いたいところですが”ってよ
Translation: Why do you have to say it like that, Mine-bo?

Script: 今日のおすすめには 違うお酒のほうが合いそうなんです
Translation: I believe a different drink will pair better with today's special.

Script: おっ おでんか
Translation: Oh, it's oden.

Script: ああ 今日は寒の戻りって 感じだから いいかもね
Translation: It got cold all of a sudden again so that sounds good.

Script: うん 熱いおでんを 頂こうじゃねえの
Translation: Yes, I'll have the hot oden please.

Script: （美音）はい （シンゾウ）はい 俺も
Translation: -Sure. -Me, too.

Script: はい じゃあ お酒はどうします？
Translation: Yes. What are you drinking?

Script: 美音坊に お任せだ
Translation: I'll leave it up to you.

Script: 分かりました
Translation: Okay.

Script: （シンゾウ）来ましたよっと
Translation: Here it is.

Script: （馨）おでんもどうぞ （トク）おおっ
Translation: -Here is your oden. -Whoa.

Script: （トク）おお これ… うまそうじゃねえかよ え？
Translation: Oh wow, it looks so good. Wow.

Script: （シンゾウ）はいはい じゃあ はい いただきやす
Translation: Okay then, let's dig in.

Script: おいおい トクさん トクさん おい まずは乾杯じゃねえのかよ おい
Translation: Hey, Toku. What about our toast?

Script: でもよ この分厚い大根が どうにもこうにも― 食ってくれってよお
Translation: But this plump daikon radish is just begging me to eat it.

Script: 一口だけ お先
Translation: Let me have one bite.

Script: （馨）ありがとうございました
Translation: Thank you very much.

Script: 飲みやがった この野郎 （美音）ウフフ…
Translation: This bastard took a sip.

Script: 人が せっかく待ってんのに
Translation: And here I was waiting for you!

Script: アハッ すまねえ シンさん
Translation: I'm sorry, Shin!

Script: しょうがねえな このおやじ
Translation: This old man can't be helped.

Script: この酒は…
Translation: This sake is…

Script: 分かりますか？
Translation: Do you know what it is?

Script: うん
Translation: Yes…

Script: ちゃんと米の香りが残っているのに 重さがないね
Translation: It has a proper aroma of rice but the taste is light.

Script: で この熟成のうまみと― 後切れもさっぱり
Translation: And it has a mature flavor as well as a refreshing aftertaste.

Script: うん…
Translation: Yeah.

Script: おっ またシンさんの勝ちかい？
Translation: Oh? Has Shin won again?

Script: まだ分かりませんってば
Translation: We don't know yet.

Script: お姉ちゃん 諦めなよ シンゾウさんには かなわないって
Translation: Let it go, Sis. You can't beat Shinzo.

Script: 俺はね 美音坊が生まれるずっと前から 酒 飲んでんだよ
Translation: I've been drinking sake since years before Mine-bo was born.

Script: あれこれ知ってて当然ですよ
Translation: Of course I know a lot of things.

Script: （美音）そりゃあ そうでしょうけど…
Translation: That may be true, but…

Script: まあ 年寄りに花持たしてやりなよ
Translation: Let the old man have his glory.

Script: で シンさん 今日の酒は？
Translation: So Shin, what is it?

Script: ずばり… “諏訪泉(すわいずみ)”
Translation: I've got to say it's Suwaizumi.

Script: ねっ しかも この―
Translation: Right? Moreover, considering this mild flavor which enriches the taste of the dishes…

Script: 優しい口当たりで 料理を引き立てるところを見ると…
Translation: Moreover, considering this mild flavor which enriches the taste of the dishes…

Script: “満天星(まんてんせい)”
Translation: I'd say it's Mantensei.

Script: どうだ！
Translation: How did I do?

Script: 正解
Translation: You got it right.

Script: （シンゾウ）ほら （客）さすがですね
Translation: You're amazing.

Script: （美音）鳥取県にある 諏訪酒造のお酒です
Translation: It is from the Suwa sake brewer in Tottori Prefecture.

Script: （シンゾウ）これこれ これこれこれ 満天星 （馨）何で分かんの？
Translation: -Yes, this! Mantensei. -How did you know?

Script: そのお酒 今日 初めて出すんだよ
Translation: -Hm? -It's our first time serving it.

Script: （シンゾウ）そうだよ まあ 大概 その… 色だよ
Translation: I know, but you can generally tell by the color.

Script: ね？　味 香り この３つ そろえば 見当はつくんだよ
Translation: Flavor, aroma and color are the three things to go by.

Script: ね？　まずはね この…
Translation: Flavor, aroma and color are the three things to go by. -First of all, look here. At this color. -It is different.

Script: これこれ （客）ああ… この色だよ これ （客）変わってますよね
Translation: -First of all, look here. At this color. -It is different.

Script: （トク）色？ （シンゾウ）これ！
Translation: -Color? -Look.

Script: （トク）おお 黄色いな この酒
Translation: Oh, it's yellow.

Script: これが酒本来の色なんだよ
Translation: This is the true color of sake.

Script: （トク）ほお～
Translation: Is that so?

Script: お酒の場合は やまぶき色って言うんですって
Translation: In the case of sake, it's called yamabuki-iro.

Script: （トク）へえ （馨）やまぶき色？
Translation: Really? Yamabuki-iro?

Script: やまぶき色って もっとすごく黄色くない？
Translation: Isn't that a stronger yellow tone?

Script: （美音）うん 私もそう思って調べてみたの
Translation: Yeah. I thought the same thing so I looked it up.

Script: 一番近い色は 密陀僧(みつだそう)って色だったんだけど
Translation: The closest color was called mitsudasou.

Script: （馨）密陀僧？ そんな色 聞いたこともないわ
Translation: Mitsudasou? I've never heard of it.

Script: だから 分かりやすく― やまぶき色って 言われてるんだと思うわよ
Translation: That's probably why by it's called by the recognized color, yamabuki-iro.

Script: （馨）わざわざ色見本 調べるところとか― お姉ちゃんらしいというか めんどくさいというか…
Translation: It's just like you to do something as tedious as look up color charts--

Script: うるさいわね 気になったら調べるでしょ
Translation: Shut it. It's normal to look things up if you're interested in them.

Script: （馨）はいはい 私も勉強させていただいてます
Translation: Yeah, sure. I learned something thanks to you.

Script: （シンゾウ）フフフ… なんてね
Translation: I was just kidding.

Script: ラベルがちょこっと 見えちゃったんだよ
Translation: I got a glimpse of the label.

Script: （美音）ずるい 反則じゃないですか
Translation: How sneaky of you. That's cheating.

Script: （トク） 脇が甘いんだよ 美音坊は
Translation: Your defense is weak, Mine-bo.

Script: （馨）引き分けってことだね
Translation: It's a draw then.

Script: （トク）それにしても このおでん うめえな
Translation: Either way, this oden is delicious.

Script: （シンゾウ）うん （トク）あれ？
Translation: Huh?

Script: 美音坊 もしかして… あれ あるんだろ？
Translation: Mine-bo. Do you have that thing?

Script: あれって？
Translation: What thing?

Script: 意地悪なこと言うなよ みそ漬けだよ みそ漬け
Translation: Don't be so mean. I'm talking about misozuke.

Script: フッ 目ざといなあ
Translation: You have a sharp eye.

Script: 明日のおすすめにしようと 思ってたのに
Translation: I was planning on making it tomorrow's special.

Script: 明日か… でも明日は予定があって 来られねえんだよ
Translation: Tomorrow, huh? But I have plans and can't come tomorrow.

Script: ん～ 今日のうち 食わせてくれよ な？ 元気をつけときたいからさ
Translation: Come on and let me have it today. I want to get some energy.

Script: いいじゃん 今日 トクさん 嫌なことあったみたいだし ねえ
Translation: What's the big deal? It seems Toku had a rough day, right?

Script: （トク）うん （馨）出してあげれば？
Translation: Let him have it.

Script: （美音）まだ 食べ頃じゃないかもしれないけど
Translation: It might not be ready yet…

Script: 分かった 特別にお出しします
Translation: Fine. I'll treat you to it.

Script: おお やった！
Translation: That's the spirit.

Script: お待ちください （トク）はい
Translation: -Please wait. -I will.

Script: （馨）はい （トク）おっ はいはい はいはい
Translation: -Here you go. -Oh! -This is it. -Egg yolk misozuke.

Script: （馨）卵黄のみそ漬けね
Translation: -This is it. -Egg yolk misozuke.

Script: （シンゾウ）う… うまそうだな
Translation: Th-That looks good.

Script: （トク）何だよ 自分だって そのザマかい
Translation: What? You can't resist it, either?

Script: （馨）はーい フライング お二人目！
Translation: And another one jumps the gun!

Script: すまねえ
Translation: Sorry.

Script: シンゾウさん 卵黄のみそ漬けね （シンゾウ）おわびついでに―
Translation: -One for Shinzo. -Thank you.

Script: 酒 もう１杯頼むよ 美音坊
Translation: -I'll order another drink as thanks. -Oh!

Script: じゃあ 今度は 軽く燗(かん)にしましょうか
Translation: Shall we go for a hot sake next?

Script: いいねえ おでんには冷や
Translation: That will be nice. Chilled sake for oden and hot sake for this.

Script: これには燗 うん
Translation: Chilled sake for oden and hot sake for this.

Script: 文句～ あるか
Translation: You gotta problem?

Script: はい
Translation: Thanks.

Script: ちょっと早いけど コクがあってうまい
Translation: It may be a bit soon, but it's rich and delicious.

Script: （美音）そういえば トクさん
Translation: By the way Toku…

Script: （トク）うん？
Translation: Huh?

Script: 憂さ晴らしって 何があったの？
Translation: Why do you need to blow off steam?

Script: ああ 今日の現場
Translation: Oh that… A lot happened at work today and we couldn't finish the job.

Script: いろいろあって終わんなくてな
Translation: A lot happened at work today and we couldn't finish the job.

Script: おやおや トクさんにしては 珍しいんじゃないの 何か どうしたんだい？
Translation: That's unusual for you. What happened?

Script: 手子(てこ)が来なかった
Translation: The teko didn't come.

Script: 手子？
Translation: -Oh? -Teko?

Script: 下働きする助手のことだ
Translation: It's what we call an apprentice.

Script: （トク）うん
Translation: Right.

Script: トクさんの現場だと―
Translation: At Toku's workplace,

Script: 資材を運んだり 道具をそろえたりか？
Translation: they do things like carry materials and gather tools, right?

Script: そうそう そうそう
Translation: Yes, that's right.

Script: 新しく入った弟子が 無断で休みやがった
Translation: The new apprentice skipped work without permission.

Script: （シンゾウ）ほう
Translation: -Oh. -Here's your beer.

Script: 具合が悪かったとか？
Translation: Was he sick?

Script: だったら まだよかったんだがな
Translation: I wish that had been the case.

Script: 嫌んなったって言いやがるんだよ （馨）え？
Translation: -He said he was fed up. -What?

Script: 朝起きて 今日も一日中― 足場の柱や板 運んだりすんのが―
Translation: Said he woke up, and just felt fed up with carrying poles and wood all day long.

Script: もう 急に嫌になったってよ
Translation: It came out of nowhere.

Script: （シンゾウ） それで現場 空けたのかい
Translation: -So he skipped work? -Yeah.

Script: ありかよ そんなの
Translation: Hey now, that's not acceptable.

Script: そんなやつには 見えなかったんだがなあ…
Translation: He didn't seem like that kind of kid…

Script: じゃあ トクさん 今日 大変だったんじゃ？
Translation: You must have had a hard day, Toku.

Script: ああ 現場監督 カンカンだよ
Translation: Yeah. The site supervisor was furious.

Script: いつもの２倍は働いたね
Translation: I did double my usual workload.

Script: ああ だって 明日もよ― 朝イチから クレーム現場をやっつけて―
Translation: And tomorrow, I have to deal with a complaint at a construction site,

Script: そのあとに戸建ての解体もあるしよ
Translation: then take down a house site after that.

Script: （馨）ああ… じゃあ 明日も大変だ
Translation: So tomorrow will be tough too!

Script: 大変なんだよ
Translation: It really will be.

Script: ああ 馨ちゃん もう１本つけて
Translation: Kaoru, give me another.

Script: （美音）トクさん
Translation: Toku.

Script: 明日に響くから 今日はもう締めにしましょ
Translation: It'll affect you tomorrow so let's call it a day.

Script: （シンゾウ）おっ そうか （トク）何だよ… 卵黄のみそ漬け以外にも おまけがあったか
Translation: Oh, does that mean the egg yolk misozuke wasn't the only giveaway?

Script: 大根には葉っぱが付き物ですから
Translation: Daikon radish do come with leaves, after all.

Script: （馨）はい どうぞ
Translation: Here you go.

Script: （トク）ああ 鮮やかだね この緑 うん
Translation: Such a brilliant green.

Script: 元気が湧いてきそうだ
Translation: This will give me energy.

Script: 外は まだ寒いけど― 春は すぐそこまでって感じよね
Translation: It's still cold outside but this brings a spring feel, doesn't it?

Script: 冬の名残のおでんと 春の先駆けの菜めし
Translation: Oden ends winter, and rice with greens brings spring.

Script: こいつは なかなか粋な出会いだね
Translation: A rather refined matchmaking.

Script: うん 言うねえ
Translation: Yeah, well said.

Script: じゃあ 卵黄のみそ漬けは さしずめ―
Translation: Then this egg yolk misozuke…

Script: 出会いを取り持つ― 春満月ってとこだな
Translation: is our matchmaker for the full moon of spring.

Script: いよっ エヘヘヘ （馨）おおっ
Translation: -Nice one. -Wow!

Script: （美音）こんにちは
Translation: Hello.

Script: どうも ありがとうございました またお願いします （女性）はーい
Translation: -Thank you, please come again! -Okay!

Script: こんにちは
Translation: Hello.

Script: （ヒロシ）おお 美音坊 （美音）ああ
Translation: -Hey, Mine-bo. -Oh!

Script: あっ 昨日の大根どうだった？
Translation: How was yesterday's daikon radish?

Script: あっ すっごくおいしかった みずみずしくて
Translation: It was really juicy and tasty.

Script: そうでしょ いいのよ あれ
Translation: Right? It's the good stuff.

Script: 今日はね これよ かき菜
Translation: Today's special is kakina.

Script: わあ おいしそう （ヒロシ）これ いいから 今日
Translation: -Looks delicious. -They're great today.

Script: じゃあ 頂いてこうかな
Translation: I'll take it.

Script: ホント？　持っていこうか あとで
Translation: Yeah? I can deliver it.

Script: ううん 大丈夫 ここで買ってっちゃう （ヒロシ）あっ ホント？ （美音）うん
Translation: -It's okay, I'll buy it now. -Okay.

Script: あと１つぐらいもらおっかな （ヒロシ）じゃあ２つね
Translation: I'll have one more. -Two then. -Yup.

Script: （美音）うん （ヒロシ）はい ありがとう
Translation: Thank you.

Script: （馨）はいはいはい
Translation: Here we go.

Script: はい ウメさん （ウメ）ああ （馨）かき菜のおひたしと… （ウメ）ありがと （馨）いつもの梅割り
Translation: Ume, here is kakina ohitashi and your usual shochu with hot water.

Script: はーい
Translation: Yes.

Script: ええっと ２つと いただきます
Translation: I'll put two here. Thank you for this.

Script: ん？　このかき菜… からしじゃなくて わさびあえだね
Translation: This kakina ohitashi is made with wasabi and not karashi mustard.

Script: そう！　たまには 違う辛さもいいでしょ
Translation: Yes! A change in spice is nice, isn't it?

Script: 私が作ったんだよ
Translation: I made it.

Script: やるねえ 馨ちゃん （馨）エヘヘ… （ウメ）ん～
Translation: Well done, Kaoru.

Script: お先っす （ウメ）どうも
Translation: -I'm heading out. -Bye now.

Script: ありがとうございます また来てね はーい
Translation: Thank you very much. -Please come again. -Okay.

Script: （美音）いらっしゃい （馨）トクさん
Translation: -Welcome. -Toku!

Script: おっ ウメ婆 来てたか
Translation: Ume-ba, you're here.

Script: 何か いいことあったの？ （トク）え？ （ウメ）ご機嫌だね
Translation: Do you have good news? You're in a great mood.

Script: 今日は来られなかったはずじゃ？
Translation: I thought you couldn't come.

Script: ああ 連チャンですまねえな （美音）ううん
Translation: -Sorry for the trouble. -Not at all.

Script: 現場がうまく片づいたんでな 報告がてら寄らせてもらったんだよ
Translation: It went well at work and I wanted to tell you about it.

Script: （馨）はい 上着 預かる （トク）おう はいはい
Translation: -I'll take your jacket. -Thanks.

Script: 昨日と同じ酒な （美音）はい （トク）あと みそ漬け
Translation: -The sake from yesterday and misozuke. -Yes.

Script: はい
Translation: Sure.

Script: 弟子がよ 朝一番で現場に来たんだよ
Translation: My apprentice came to the work site first thing in the morning.

Script: （馨）え？ あの逃げ出しちゃった人？
Translation: -The one that bailed on work? -Yeah.

Script: そうそう でな
Translation: -The one that bailed on work? -Yeah. Bracing for the possibility we'd never be hired again,

Script: 二度と仕事はもらえない覚悟で―
Translation: Bracing for the possibility we'd never be hired again,

Script: 現場監督のとこ ２人で謝りに行ったんだよ
Translation: we went to apologize to the supervisor.

Script: そしたらよ “二度とあんたらには頼まないって 言いたいところだが―”
Translation: And he says, "'I don't want to work with you ever again', is what I want to say,

Script: “ふだんの仕事は確かだから 今回は大目に見てやる”ってよ
Translation: but you always do such a good job so I will let it go this time."

Script: （馨）ああ よかった （トク）おう
Translation: -That's great news. -Yes.

Script: （馨）でも どういう風の吹き回し？ 昨日はカンカンに 怒ってたんですよね？
Translation: But why did he change his mind? He was angry yesterday, right?

Script: 冷静になって考えたらしいんだな
Translation: Apparently he calmed down and thought it over.

Script: その現場監督もよ 昔はヤンチャで相当荒れてたって
Translation: The supervisor said he himself was reckless and a mess as a young man.

Script: でも 今はちゃんと働いてる
Translation: But he's working properly now.

Script: だから若いやつは長い目で 見てやらないとってな うん
Translation: So he said he needs to be patient with young ones, too.
